title: Sid Meier’s Civilization® VI: Leader Pass
description: Rethink how you rule with the Civilization VI: Leader Pass! Discover new paths to world domination with 18 new leader selections. New content is available free for current and new owners of Civilization VI Anthology.
longDescription:
Return to rule with the Civilization VI: Leader Pass* and build the greatest empire in history with a huge roster of new and familiar faces. Throughout 6 DLCs that are scheduled for release between November 2022 - March 2023**, we will feature 12 leaders brand new to Civilization VI and 6 new takes on classic Civilization leaders.

The Leader Pass encourages you to break out of your comfort zone with new approaches to diplomacy, war, expansion, and more. Each leader arrives with a suite of surprising new or updated abilities alongside inventive new agendas that'll change the way you play over five exciting months of world domination. 

The six-part Leader Pass is included at no extra charge for new and existing owners of the Civilization VI Anthology on Epic. 

*Base game required to access all Civilization VI Leader Pass content and additional DLC packs required to access certain leaders. Leader Pass is only available on Steam and Epic. On PC, Leader Pass will be available for purchase and is already included as part of the Civilization VI Anthology Edition.

**Estimated release dates, subject to change. Leader Pass content will be automatically delivered in-game as it is released.

# The Leader Pass includes: 

Pack #1: [Great Negotiators Pack](https://civilization.com/news/entries/new-leaders-coming-to-civilization-vi/) 
Test your diplomacy skills with the Great Negotiators Pack, including Abraham Lincoln (United States), Queen Mbande Nzinga (Kongo), and Sultan Saladin (Arabia). 

Pack #2: [Great Commanders Pack](https://civilization.com/news/entries/new-leaders-coming-to-civilization-vi/)
Lead your troops to victory with the Great Commanders Pack, including Tokugawa (Japan), Nader Shah (Persia)¹, and Suleiman the Magnificent (Ottoman Empire)².

Pack #3: [Rulers of China Pack](https://civilization.com/news/entries/new-leaders-coming-to-civilization-vi/)
Establish some new dynasties with the Rulers of China Pack, including Yongle, Qin Shi Huang the Unifier, and Wu Zetian.

Pack #4: [Rulers of the Sahara Pack](https://civilization.com/news/entries/new-leaders-coming-to-civilization-vi/)
Revisit the cradle of humanity with the Rulers of the Sahara Pack, including Ramses (Egypt), Ptolemaic Cleopatra (Egypt), King Sundiata Keita (Mali)².

Pack #5: [Great Builders Pack](https://civilization.com/news/entries/new-leaders-coming-to-civilization-vi/)
Rebuild the world better than ever with the Great Builders Pack, including Theodora (Byzantines)³, Sejong (Korea)⁴, and Ludwig II (Germany).

Pack #6: [Ruler of England Pack](https://civilization.com/news/entries/new-leaders-coming-to-civilization-vi/)
Fill out your growing collection of monarchs with the Rulers of England Pack, including Elizabeth I (England), Varangian Harald Hadrada (Norway), and Victoria (England).

¹ Requires Persia & Macedon Scenario Pack to play
² Requires Gathering Storm expansion to play
³ Requires New Frontier Pass and Byzantium & Gaul Pack to play
⁴ Requires Rise & Fall expansion to play
